verses.roman:
prātaḥ-kṛtya kari' kare nāma-saṅkīrtana
śacīmātā lañā āilā advaita-bhavana

synonyms: prātaḥ-kṛtya—the morning duties; kari'-finishing; kare—does; nāma-saṅkīrtana—chanting the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra; śacī-mātā—mother Śacī; lañā—with; āilā—came; advaita-bhavana—at the house of Advaita Ācārya.
translation: In the morning, after regular duties were completed and the Lord was chanting the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra, the people accompanied Śacīmātā to the house of Advaita Ācārya.
